title: Task
description: ROSS Leaders seeks a creative writer or team of writers who can collaborate with the organization’s leadership to produce engaging content tailored to stakeholders, donors, and supporters. The expected outcome includes content that will be utilized across multiple communication and marketing platforms, including the ROSS website, LinkedIn, Facebook, X/Twitter, Instagram, and other social media.

title: Submission
description: You will be submitting an essay and two short answer responses of the indicated prompts. These will be coupled by videos of you/the team dictating the script.

title: Awards
description: The competitor with the best design would then have the opportunity to work with ROSS Leaders and obtain an internship in making and maintaining their communications front.

title: Team
description: Submissions are to be done as a team. Each team will consist of 2-6 members.

title: Judges
description: ROSS Leaders will be deciding the finalists on the level of communication, availability of the video, and the uniqueness of the speech. This speech should convey the message ROSS Leaders’ want in a detailed yet understandable way. This video can be an interview or a podcast, and must include the script in the submission.
